effect: Any character within the electromagnetic storm who makes a tech attack suffers 1 Difficulty on the attack roll.

name: SUBMACHINE GUN [STORMWING]
effect: This weapon does not suffer DIFFICULTY from being fired while the Stormwing is ENGAGED.

name: FLANKER
effect: During its turn, the Stormwing gains 1 Accuracy on attacks and tech attacks made against enemies who it was not in line of sight of at the beginning of its turn.

name: THUNDERBOLT JUMPJETS
effect: The Stormwing can fly when it boosts, but must end its turn standing on a surface or it will fall. If it provokes attacks from reactions while boosting, those attacks suffer an additional 1 Difficulty.

name: STORMFALL
trigger: The STORMWING ends a BOOST action in which it flew.
effect: The Stormwing may emanate a burst 2 pulse of disrupting electricity around itself. All enemies within the area must pass a Systems check or suffer {1/2/3} energy damage and become Impaired until the end of their next turn.

name: BREACHING IMPACT
effect: When the Stormwing finishes the movement of a BOOST action, it may deal 10 AP damage to an adjacent object or piece of terrain.

name: HARPY TURBOJETS
effect: When the Stormwing boosts, it may use this system to double its speed for the duration of the boost action.

name: FULL-SPECTRUM OVERLOAD
effect: The target takes {2/3/4} heat and loses the ability to make reactions until the end of its next turn.

name: REFLEX HEAVY PISTOL SYSTEM
effect: When the Stormwing Skirmishes with its submachine gun, it can also make an attack with the Reflex Heavy Pistol System.

name: SMOKE CHARGES
effect: The Stormwing throws a smoke Grenade (Range 5, Blast 2) which creates a blast area granting soft cover to all characters and objects. The area lasts until the end of the Stormwing’s next turn.

name: ASSAULT NETWORK
effect: At the beginning of the Streetsweeper’s turn, all allies within range 5 of its position can move up to 2 squares. This movement does not provoke reactions of any kind.

name: CROSSFIRE CO-ORDINATES
effect: If any ally within range 5 of the Streetsweeper’s location has unimpeded line of sight on an enemy in soft cover or flanking on an enemy in hard cover, that enemy does not get the benefits of cover against attacks from all allies within range 5 of the Streetsweeper’s location. This system does not provide allies with line of sight to a target; it merely denies cover benefits.

name: SNAPSHOT COMMAND
effect: With an order, the Streetsweeper gives an ally within range 5 an additional overwatch reaction. The ally also gains the ability to make overwatch attacks as a reaction to an enemy within range 10 moving from cover to a space without it. The Streetsweeper loses its own overwatch reaction when using this ability, and the target loses the additional overwatch reaction and the ability to react to enemies leaving cover at the end of their next turn.

name: ADVANCING FIRE
effect: Whenever an ally within range 5 of the Streetsweeper makes a ranged attack, they can also move one square. If this provokes an overwatch reaction, the ally gains soft cover against the overwatch attack.

name: HEAVY MAUL
effect: This weapon gains the AP tag against objects and terrain.

name: MICROGRENADE SATURATION POD
effect: If this weapon targets an enemy or space within a fortification, building, or other structure, it loses blast 1 and instead also makes an attack against every other enemy within range 3 who is also within that structure.

name: SEARCH AND DESTROY
effect: The Streetsweeper and all allies within range 5 of its position gain 2 Accuracy on Systems checks to search for hidden enemies.

name: THREAT RESPONSE ENHANCEMENT SUITE
effect: Whenever an ally with the Grunt template within range 5 of the Streetsweeper would be destroyed by taking energy, explosive, or kinetic damage, it instead remains at 1 HP if it passes a hull save.

name: TERRAFORMING POD LAUNCHER
on_hit: Targets hit by this weapon suffer Knockback 2 and must pass an Agility check or suffer {9/11/13} kinetic damage and be knocked prone.
effect:
After firing this weapon, place a Terraforming Pod in the target's original space, or as close as possible. The pod deals 50 AP kinetic damage to any terrain or objects in the spot it lands; if this is not enough to destroy an obstruction, the pod is destroyed.
Terraforming Pod (Size 1, HP {15/20/25}, Evasion 5, E-Defence 5, Tags: Deployable)
The Terraforming Pod cannot move under any circumstances, nor be knocked prone. The Terraformer chooses the type of pod it launches each time it fires. The effects remain or repeat as long as the pod remains. The Terraformer can have up to four pods in play at once, deactivating an old one automatically when it would go over that limit. Deactivated pods remain as objects in the scene but cease to emit any effects.
  • Atmospheric Cage: All characters in a burst 5 zone around the pod gain resistance to explosive damage, and any character who flies in the zone becomes Slowed until the end of their next turn.
  • Electromagnetic Anchor: At the beginning of the Terraformer’s turn, choose one target within range 5 of the pod and inflict {3/4/5} energy damage and the Jammed condition on it until the end of its next turn.
  • Fauna Delivery Container: The pod disgorges two Monstrosities with the Acid Spittle optional system and the Grunt template. These Monstrosities cannot willingly move beyond range 5 of the Pod, and immediately die if they are forced to do so. At the beginning of the Terraformer’s turn, if there are less than two Monstrosities remaining, the pod disgorges a new one.
  • Quake Leveller Drill: At the beginning of the Terraformer’s turn, all objects and pieces of terrain within a burst 5 area of the pod lose 1 Size; if this reduces them to 0 Size, it destroys them. All characters within the area must pass a Hull save or be Slowed until the end of their next turn.
  • Nanoassembly Hive: A burst 5 zone around the pod is difficult terrain and soft cover.

name: HEAVY FRAME
effect: The Terraformer cannot be knocked back or prone by actors smaller than itself.

name: AREA PURGE RETROJETS
effect: The Terraforming Pod Launcher’s attack roll changes to +1 vs evasion/tier plus 3 Difficulty. Anyone adjacent to a terraforming pod when it is placed on the battlefield takes 1 Burn damage.

name: ATMOSPHERIC HEATING POD
effect:
When firing the TERRAFORMING POD LAUNCHER, the TERRAFORMER may choose to launch this pod instead of one of its other pods.
Atmospheric Heating Pod (Size 1, HP {15/20/25}, Evasion 5, E-Defence 5, Tags: Deployable)
While a character is within a burst 5 zone around the pod, all of their systems and weapons that generate heat generate 1 more heat than normal.

name: ECOSYSTEM RESET POD
effect:
When firing the TERRAFORMING POD LAUNCHER, the TERRAFORMER may choose to launch this pod instead of one of its other pods.
Ecosystem Reset Pod (Size 1, HP {15/20/25}, Evasion 5, E-Defence 5, Tags: Deployable)
On impact, this pod destroys all soft and hard cover from vegetation within a Burst 5 area, and deals {3/4/5} Burn damage to characters with the Biological tag in the affected area. After this, the pod immediately deactivates.

name: HILLBREAKER
on_hit: Enemies struck by this attack must pass a Hull save or be knocked prone. Objects and terrain take {10/15/20} AP damage.

name: MILITARY-GRADE FABRICATION PROTOCOLS
effect: Instead of firing one of its normal Terraforming Pods, the Terraformer may instead cause a pod that has just landed to immediately unfold into a bunker, creating a 3x3 zone that provides hard cover to anyone within the area against attacks from all directions. The bunker counts as a size 3 piece of terrain that has evasion 5 and 30 HP.

name: MOLECULAR DISINTEGRATION ORB-LACE
effect: Throwing the Molecular Disintegration Orb-Lace does not disarm the Theurge of this weapon.
on_hit: Targets struck by this weapon are Shredded until the Theurge hits another target with the Orb-Lace or the scene ends; they cannot remove this instance of the Shredded condition via Stabilize.

name: MOLECULAR INTEGRATION HALO
effect: One ally within range becomes resistant to explosive damage and immune to knockback, being knocked prone, and the Shredded and Slowed Conditions until the beginning of the Theurge’s next turn.

name: FUNDAMENTAL INVULNERABILITY MANDALA
effect:
Mandala (Deployable, {10/12/15} HP, 2 armor, 10 evasion, 10 e-defence, immune to explosive damage)
The Theurge places the Mandala in an adjacent free space.Allies within range 5 of the Mandala cannot be reduced to 0 HP by an attack unless they were already at 1 HP; attacks that would otherwise reduce them to 0 HP instead reduce them to 1 HP. The Mandala lasts until the end of the Theurge’s next turn.

name: MOLECULAR ENLIGHTENMENT INTEGRATION CIRCUITS
effect: The Theurge is immune to explosive damage, knockback, being knocked prone, and the Shredded and Slowed Conditions.

name: ATOMIC ALIGNMENT SHROUD
effect: The Theurge targets a single ally within sensor range and gives it a shroud that has {5/10/15} HP and no armour. Any attacks that deal damage to the ally instead hit the shroud, dealing damage to it as normal; once the shroud has run out of HP it is destroyed, and any damage that remains rolls over onto the original target. The shroud lasts until the beginning of the Theurge’s next turn.

name: EMERGENCY REINTEGRATION MANTRA
effect: The Theurge cannot take any other actions during the turn it uses Emergency Reintegration Mantra, not even movement, and it cannot use this system before round 3 of a combat. The Theurge and all allies within a burst 4 area around it regain {5/10/15} HP.

name: HARMONIOUS RESONANCE ANCHOR
effect: No character can teleport in or out of spaces within an area of burst 5 around the Theurge. Additionally, although primarily relevant on narrative terms, MONIST-class attempts to control reality or spacetime have no effect within the area.

name: MOLECULAR CASTIGATION
effect: When the Shredded condition caused by the Molecular Disintegration Orb-Lace ends on a target, anyone adjacent to the target takes {2/3/4} explosive damage.

name: TEMPLE
effect: Tech attacks are made against the Theurge and any allies adjacent to it with 1 Difficulty, and the Theurge and any allies adjacent to it make all Systems saves with 1 Accuracy.

name: PERISH
effect: On hit, the target takes {2/3/4} heat and {2/3/4} AP energy damage.

name: SUBMIT
effect: On hit, the target takes {2/3/4} heat, and the Tyrant chooses one of the following effects:<li>all the target’s weapons with the Loading tag immediately become unloaded;<li>all the target’s weapons with the [Overkill] tag immediately deal the target 1 heat;<li>one of the target’s systems with the Grenade tag immediately detonates one charge centred on the target’s space;<li>one AI the target has immediately unshackles.

name: OBEY
effect: On hit, the target takes {2/3/4} heat and at the beginning of the target’s next turn, the Tyrant can move it up to its Speed in a direction of the Tyrant’s choice, obeying engagement and triggering reactions as normal. It must then make a Systems save; if it fails, then this movement effect occurs again at the beginning of its following turn along with another Systems save, and so on until it passes or the scene ends.

name: DOMINATED SYSTEMS
effect: When the Tyrant deals Reactor Stress to an enemy, they suffer 2 Difficulty to all Systems checks and saves until they are able to take a full repair.

name: BETRAY
effect: On hit, the target takes {2/3/4} heat and copies its e-defence value onto any of its own allies within burst 4 of its location who have a higher e-defence value than the target. This lasts until the end of the next turn.

name: CROWN OF ICE
effect: When the Tyrant is the target of a tech attack, it gains 2 Accuracy on its next tech attack against the attacker before the end of the Tyrant’s next turn.

name: KNEEL
effect: On hit, targets takes {1/2/3} heat and are knocked prone. Any Protocols they are running immediately deactivate.

name: TURN
trigger: An enemy within sensor range targets the TYRANT with an attack.
effect: Make a Tech Attack against that enemy. If the attack hits, the Tyrant can retarget the incoming attack onto another valid target, friend or foe, within range 3 of its position.

name: WALL OF FIRE
effect: The Tyrant creates a burst 2 zone within sensor range. Until the end of the next turn, anyone targeting a character within the Wall of FIRE zone with a tech attack suffers {2/3/4} heat.

name: VOLCANO CANNON
effect: When the Vulcan fires this weapon, it gains soft cover until the end of its next turn. After firing, at the start of the Vulcan’s next turn, it attacks the same Line 20 area again as a Free Action, dealing Burn 8 to any targets hit.

name: MOLTEN EFFLUENT NOZZLE-GUN
effect: Firing this weapon cools the Vulcan for 2 heat.
on_hit: Targets struck by this weapon must pass an Agility save or become Immobilized until the end of their next turn.

name: HEAVY REACTOR SHIELDING
effect: The Vulcan has resistance to Energy and Burn damage.

name: REACTOR RESONANCE CASCADE FREQUENCIES
effect:
The Vulcan’s Volcano Cannon no longer does damage. Instead, targets hit by it must pass an Engineering save or immediately take 1 point of Reactor Stress and cool to 0 heat. Characters who pass their save immediately gain enough heat to put them 1 point off Overheating.
Firing the weapon causes the Vulcan to immediately Shut Down.

name: SCORCHED EARTH
effect: When the Vulcan fires the Volcano Cannon, it may choose to take an additional 4 heat. If it does so, the area of the cannon’s effect also becomes dangerous terrain dealing Burn damage until the end of the scene.

name: THERMAL TARGETING DRONE
effect:
Select a blast 5 area in Sensors (15). All enemies in the blast area who are in the danger zone, are currently suffering from ongoing Burn, or who have the Exposed condition, gain the Lock On condition.
[Note: this system doesn't have the Drone tag.]

name: THERMOBARIC SHOCKWAVE
effect:
When the Volcano Cannon is fired, characters adjacent to the Volcano Cannon’s area of effect must pass a Hull save or be knocked prone.
[Note: this does not apply to the secondary free action, just the initial firing of the weapon.]

name: DISTORTION SCYTHE
effect: After making an attack with this weapon, the Warper may teleport up to 2 spaces.

name: TRUTH OF RETRIBUTION
effect: As a Quick Tech, the Warper chooses a single target within its sensor range and marks them. The mark remains until the end of the scene, or until the Warper uses Truth of Retribution to mark a new target, whereupon the old mark immediately fades.

name: RETRIBUTION
trigger: A character marked by the Warper's Truth of Retribution begins an attack that does not include the Warper as one of its targets.
effect: 1/round as a reaction, the Warper may teleport to a free space within range 2 of them and immediately make an attack with its Distortion Scythe. The target may then continue with its attack but, if the Warper is now adjacent to it, will suffer engagement penalties to ranged attacks as normal.

name: LIE OF DISTANCE
effect: The Warper chooses a single ally within sensor range and warps the fabric of space-time around them. Until the beginning of the Warper’s next turn, ranged attacks made against the ally treat it as being 5 squares further away from the attacker than it really is, which may leave it out of range.

name: ALTERNATE JOURNEYS
effect: When the effects of the Warper’s Lie of Distance end on an ally, the Warper may immediately teleport the target up to 5 squares.

name: CONTORTION SPHERE
effect: If an enemy marked by the Warper’s Truth of Retribution misses with an attack that triggered Truth of Retribution's reaction, the Warper may force them to reroll the attack against a new target of the Warper’s choice, even if it is one of their allies.

name: MYRIAD PATHWAYS
effect: The Warper’s Truth of Retribution ability marks two targets at a time, and it can make a reaction to each target once per round.

name: SOLIPSISM NEEDLER
on_hit: The target's attacks are disrupted. Against characters who aren't the Warper, the target's attacks are affected by Soft Cover. If the target attacks the Warper, or a character who already has Soft or Hard Cover, their attack resolves normally.

name: THE TORMENT OF PERSPECTIVE
effect:
The Warper chooses a single target within its sensor range and marks them. If the marked character begins an attack that does not include the Warper as one of its targets, all targets of that attack have their armour increased by 1 (to a maximum of 4). The mark remains until the end of the scene, or until the Warper uses the Torment of Perspective to mark a new target, whereupon the old one immediately fades.
[This is a separate mark from the Truth of Retribution mark.]

name: WRECKING BALL
effect: This weapon may attack 1-3 targets within Threat 2. Objects and Terrain hit by this weapon take 10 AP Kinetic damage.
on_hit: Enemies struck by this weapon must pass a Hull save or be knocked prone.

name: MAGLOCK BUCKLER
effect: Once per round as a reaction, when an engaged enemy hits the Wrecker with an attack, the Wrecker can automatically grapple the attacker and lock the weapon used. As long as the enemy remains adjacent to the Wrecker, that weapon is effectively disabled. The Wrecker can only lock a single weapon at a time in this way; using this system again frees any previously locked weapon, although it doesn’t end any grapples.

name: DISASSEMBLE
effect: When the Wrecker deals Structure damage to an enemy, it treats all results of Glancing Blow on the Structure damage table as System Trauma. When the Wrecker inflicts a System Trauma result on an enemy, the Wrecker chooses a system or weapon to destroy instead of the enemy choosing.

name: WRECKER
effect: When the Wrecker deals Structure damage to an enemy, they suffer 2 Difficulty to all Hull checks and saves until they are able to take a full repair. When the Wrecker deals Reactor Stress to an enemy, they suffer 2 Difficulty to all Engineering checks and saves until they are able to take a full repair.

name: POWER SAW
effect: This weapon gains 2 Accuracy if the target is grappled.

name: CANNIBALIZE
effect: When the Wrecker inflicts structure damage on an enemy with a melee weapon, or when it ends its turn adjacent to a destroyed mech, it gains +2 armour until the beginning of its next turn.

name: HARPOON
on_hit: If the target is the same size or smaller than the Wrecker, they are pulled in a straight line as far as possible toward the Wrecker and ending in an adjacent space. Otherwise, the Wrecker is pulled towards the target. The Wrecker then grapples the target automatically if it is adjacent.

name: HYPERGRINDERS
effect: As a quick action, the Wrecker forces a single adjacent target to make a Hull [save]. On failure, the target suffers {3/4/5} heat and become Shredded until the end of its next turn.

name: SYSTEMS BREACH
effect: When the Wrecker makes a Quick Tech action to invade an enemy adjacent to it, it uses Engineering instead of Systems to make the attack and gains 1 Accuracy on the roll.

name: CAUSALITY LEECH
effect: Whenever a PC ends their turn adjacent to one or more Metafold Wraiths, the PC must pass a Grit save. Failure allows the GM to teleport the PC mech up to {2/3/4} spaces in any direction to a free space, to heal an adjacent Metafold Wraith for {2/3/4} HP, or to break future causality for the PC. The GM notes each future causality break a PC earns, and may apply them as Difficulty on any future trigger roll within this or the following mission; any number may be applied to a single roll at once. Failures or complications from a causality break manifest as bewildering and frightening results that make little to no sense within context.

name: OUT OF SYNC
effect: All Wraiths in the scene have resistance to one of Burn, energy, explosive, or kinetic damage. As a Full Action, any Wraith can change the Out of Sync resistance to another damage type, affecting all Wraiths with this change.

name: REALITY GLITCH
effect: Once per round as a reaction in response to being targeted by an attack or effect, the Wraith may immediately teleport to a free space it can see within range {4/6/8}. If this renders the targeted action invalid, the actor may choose a new valid target instead.

name: SPACES BETWEEN THE WALLS
effect: Whenever a Metafold Wraith is subjected to forced movement of any kind, the Metafold Wraith chooses the direction it moves instead of the character targeting it. It can even choose the direction if struck with Knockback, rather than having to move directly away from the attacker.

name: METAFOLD SCARS
effect: An NPC with the Metafold Wraith template can choose one of the Metafold Wraith systems or traits below.

name: ANCHOR
effect: As a Free Action at the end of its turn, the Metafold Wraith can teleport to a free space within range 5 of a specific object or piece of terrain that it is paracausally anchored to. It can always teleport to the anchor in this way, regardless of any separation of time or space between the two.

name: FRACTAL KILL
effect:
The Metafold Wraith can create a figment copy of an enemy within range 10, spinning off a hostile part of the target’s own timeline filled with malevolent self-hatred or a yearning hunger to be the sole version of the target in existence. The copy is an NPC with the Grunt template and the characteristics of the target, although it has 0 charges in any Limited systems that the target possesses and cannot use CORE powers. At the end of the scene, if the target is dead but a Fractal Kill copy remains, the copy manifests permanently as a new version of the target in this reality, albeit with a twisted, distorted sense of their own history and a likely very different personality. Otherwise, any surviving Fractal Kill copies will attempt to track down and murder
the original over the course of the following mission, appearing from improbable locations via paracausality at critical moments to interfere against their originator.

name: i am you am i am you am am who am i who am i
effect: The Metafold Wraith forces an adjacent enemy to pass a Grit save or become entangled with the Wraith’s causality. Whenever the target receives healing or any sort of temporary benefit from another character, such as being targeted by the Bolster action or receiving temporary resistance to damage from an ally’s shield, the Metafold Wraith receives the same benefit. However, if the target loses a point of Structure or Reactor Stress, so does the Metafold Wraith. The effect of this trait lasts until the Wraith is destroyed, the target leaves the battlefield for any reason—even temporarily—or the scene ends. The target also suffers 1 Difficulty on any trigger for the remainder of the session where the action or the consequences involved relate to the target’s sense of self, isolation, loneliness, or connections to others.

name: MIRROR TWIN
effect: When the Metafold Wraith is deployed, it entangles itself with a single enemy mech in the scene. Once per round as a reaction to the entangled character moving, whether with regular movement, a Boost action, or other means, the Wraith may copy the movement to its full distance but in the opposite direction to that which the entangled character moves. However, the Wraith does not apply its Space Between The Walls trait to forced movement that originates from the entangled character. The target also suffers 1 Difficulty to any trigger for the remainder of the session where the action or the consequences involved relate to the target’s sense of spatial relationships between things, precise measurements, or co-ordination of actions with others.

name: REVENANT
effect: If the Metafold Wraith is destroyed, it will reform, repair, reassemble, have its reflection emerge from a mirror dimension, or otherwise return from death before the end of the mission, even if suffering total physical annihilation. A character can prevent this from triggering by spending a Full Action adjacent to the Wraith’s wreck and making a Grit check, with a success countering Revenant. Each Revenant is subject to only the first Grit check made against it each scene; subsequent characters attempting the same action against the wreck within a scene will have no effect.

name: DISCIPLINED COORDINATION
effect: The Regiment member gains 1 Accuracy on all skills and checks as long as it is adjacent to at least one friendly mech with the Regiment template.

name: REGIMENT SYSTEMS
effect: Choose a single Regiment system or trait from the list below for the group the NPC belongs to. When choosing optional systems and modules, any NPC from the group can pick that particular option. NPCs don’t have to use their group’s Regiment system or trait, but if they do, they can only pick that specific one, and can’t use other Regiment systems or traits from the list.

name: ARMED TO THE TEETH
effect: When the NPC attacks with another weapon as part of a Skirmish or Barrage Action, it may also attack with Armed to the Teeth as a Free Action.

name: DEFENSIVE FORMATION
effect: As long as the NPC is adjacent to at least two allies with this template, ranged weapon attacks against it or adjacent allies suffer 1 Difficulty.

name: DEMOLITION EXPERTS
effect: The NPC deals 10 AP explosive damage to an adjacent object or piece of terrain that at least one ally with this template is also adjacent to.

name: DIGITERRORISTS
effect: The NPC can critically hit with tech attacks. When it does so, the target treats the NPC and its allies with this template as having hard cover until the end of the target’s next turn.

name: ECM SPECIALISTS
effect: As long as the NPC is adjacent to at least one ally with this template, tech attacks that hit it also cause the attacker to suffer 1 heat.

name: EXTERMINATION SQUADS
effect: When the NPC deals heat or Burn damage to a target, one adjacent ally with this template may take a reaction to inflict {1/2/3} Burn damage to the target as long as they are within range 5 of the ally.

name: GRENADIERS
effect: The NPC gains the Frag Grenade system below. While adjacent to at least one ally with this template, it also gains a +1 bonus to Recharge rolls for any grenade or mine systems or any weapons with the Recharge tag it possesses.

name: FRAG GRENADE
effect:
This system is meant to be paired with the Grenadiers trait, and cannot be taken on its own.
Frag Grenade (Grenade, Range 5, Blast 2): The grenade deals {4/5/6} explosive damage to characters caught within, or half on a successful Agility save.

name: HEAVY ASSAULT FORMATION
effect: As long as the NPC is adjacent to at least one ally with this template, it is immune to critical hits.

name: OUTRIDER FORMATION
effect: If the NPC is adjacent to the same enemy as one of its allies with this template, the NPC may ignore that enemy for the purposes of engagement and does not trigger the enemy’s Overwatch reaction via movement.

name: PATROL FORMATION
effect: As long as the NPC is adjacent to at least one ally with this template, it gains 1 Accuracy on Search rolls and on its Overwatch attack rolls.

name: SHARPSHOOTER TEAMS
effect: The NPC can critically hit with weapons. When it does so, one adjacent ally with this template may immediately take the Lock On action as a reaction against the target, if it is within sensor range.

name: TENACIOUS
effect: If the NPC loses its last point of Structure while adjacent to at least one ally with this template, it may immediately make a Skirmish action as a reaction before being destroyed.
